alert.note: Alert for Coastal Calhoun; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 9:27PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, Victoria and northeastern Goliad Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 926 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Ander to near Inez. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Goliad, Guadalupe, Fannin, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Weesatche, Weser, Nursery, Victoria Riverside Park, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Saxet Lakes, Brentwood Subdivision, Inez, Salem, Telferner, Downtown Victoria, Schroeder, Dacosta and Ander. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 628 and 646. US Highway 59 between mile markers 624 and 670. US Highway 77 between mile markers 566 and 594. US Highway 87 between mile markers 798 and 834. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Calhoun; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Victoria
